language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: = wind blows; could be fifit or pipit
a. to blow as the wind;
b. to blow on, to blow out
Light breeze (I), blow generally gentle breeze (McE)
(vent qui souffle fort de tous les côtés)
b. can be used of the wind also (tr.)
to blow (something) as by wind or person
Blow, as flute or the wind (Ebt)
to blow - of the wind (likely a recent Tahitian loanword as /f/ -> /ʔ/ has not occurred)
to blow air on (of a person or wind)
blow (with the mouth) on a fire
WP: powi, puputa VL: mapowi WB: reresa
